div.div: Decision table of seven management scenarios based on weightings of performance metrics.
div.p: Mean normalized results of ecosystem metrics used in performance evaluation of alternative management scenarios with regards to the ecosystem status (goals # 1â€“3) and socio-economic conditions (metrics # 4a,b). Results for each metric ( Table 1, Fig 3) were scaled between zero (worst) and one (best). LBSP is land-based sources of pollution. Bold values are highest (best) values per row.
